panels.title: CockroachDB SQL exec latency: 95th percentile, by node: $node
CockroachDB SQL exec latency: 99th percentile, by node: $node
CockroachDB SQL planning or runtime errors per second: $node

panels.description: Exponentially-weighted 30-minute moving average showing the distribution of queries served by a given node's store.
panels.title: Queries per second, by store: $node

targets.expr: (SUM(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{role="$cluster",mode="user"}[30s])) BY (vmname, cpu) + SUM(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{role="$cluster",mode="kernel"}[30s])) BY (vmname, cpu)) / (SUM(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{role="$cluster",mode="user"}[30s])) BY (vmname, cpu) + SUM(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{role="$cluster",mode="kernel"}[30s])) BY (vmname, cpu) + SUM(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{role="$cluster",mode="idle"}[30s])) BY (vmname, cpu))

panels.title: CPU utilization, by node and CPU

panels.description: Time each I/O was outstanding to the disk device.  This does not include any queueing in the OS.
panels.title: Disk: average I/O time (outstanding to device)

panels.description: Percent of time that at least one I/O was outstanding to a device
panels.title: Disks: Percent busy
Disk I/O: bytes written per second
Disk I/O: bytes read per second
Network I/O: bytes out per second
Network I/O: bytes in per second
Disk: average I/O time queued in device driver
CockroachDB various internal errors per second

panels.description: Mean clock offset with other nodes as measured by cockroach.
panels.title: Mean RPC Clock Offset: $node

targets.expr: (SUM(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{role!="crdb_exploration_db",role!="crdb_exploration_nvmedb",mode="user"}[30s])) BY (vmname, cpu) + SUM(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{role!="crdb_exploration_db",role!="crdb_exploration_nvmedb",mode="kernel"}[30s])) BY (vmname, cpu)) / (SUM(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{role!="crdb_exploration_db",role!="crdb_exploration_nvmedb",mode="user"}[30s])) BY (vmname, cpu) + SUM(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{role!="crdb_exploration_db",role!="crdb_exploration_nvmedb",mode="kernel"}[30s])) BY (vmname, cpu) + SUM(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{role!="crdb_exploration_db",role!="crdb_exploration_nvmedb",mode="idle"}[30s])) BY (vmname, cpu))

panels.title: CPU utilization, by node and CPU

panels.description: Percent of time that at least one I/O was outstanding to a device
panels.title: Disks: Percent busy
